name: goldenproxy
description: An open source and customisable multi purpose Minecraft proxy

scripts.setup: npm install && npm install -g typescript ts-node sass
scripts.nmp_cache_clear: py -c "import os, shutil; appdata=os.getenv('APPDATA'); [os.remove(os.path.join(appdata, '.minecraft', 'nmp-cache', i)) for i in os.listdir(os.path.join(appdata, '.minecraft', 'nmp-cache'))];

author: GoldenProxy Contributors
